abstract: Citigroup‘s venture capital arm led a $400 million deal for a controlling stake in Waddington North America, a maker of disposable cups, dinnerware and cutlery, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s venture capital arm led a $400 million deal for a controlling stake in Waddington North America, a maker of disposable cups, dinnerware and cutlery, according to Reuters.

headline.main: Citigroup Leads $400 Million Deal for Cupmaker
